title: Room
author: Emma Donoghue

quote_first: In the living room the voice-clock sang, Tick-tock, seven o'clock, time to get up, time to get up, seven o ‘clock! as if it were afraid that nobody would. The morning house lay empty. The clock ticked on, repeating and repeating its sounds into the emptiness.
title: There Will Come Soft Rains
author: Ray Bradbury
